FIELD.NAME: participantrole
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of participants in the 360-degree feedback. 0 means all course participants. Otherwise, the role ID for a course role (e.g. student, teacher, editing teacher, etc.).

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this 360 feedback activity is ready to be used by the participants. 0 - Not yet ready, 1 - Ready

FIELD.NAME: with_self_review
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this has self-review. 0 - Disabled. 1 - Enabled.

FIELD.NAME: releasing
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to release this feedback to the participants 0 - Closed to participants. Participants cannot view the feedback given to them. Only those with the capability. 1 - Open to participants. Participants can view the feedback given to them any time. 2 - Manual release. Participants can view the feedback given to them when released by users who have the capability to manage the 360 instance (e.g. teacher, manager, admin). 3 - Release after the activity has closed

FIELD.NAME: released
FIELD.COMMENT: For instances that are manually released. 0 = Not yet released. 1 = Released.

FIELD.NAME: undodecline
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to allow participants to undo their declined feedbacks to other users. 0 - Do not allow. 1 - Allow.

FIELD.NAME: createdby
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the one who created this question.

FIELD.NAME: editedby
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the one who edited the question

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the question was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the question was edited.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Primary key for the question item.

TABLE.NAME: threesixo_submission
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all the statuses for the 360 feedback.

FIELD.NAME: threesixo
FIELD.COMMENT: ID from feedback table.

FIELD.NAME: fromuser
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the one giving feedback. 0 if anonymous mode.

FIELD.NAME: touser
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of the user that is being given feedback on.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 for unanswered, 1 for in progress, 2 for completed, 3 for declined

FIELD.NAME: remarks
FIELD.COMMENT: Reason why the user declined to give feedback.

TABLE.NAME: threesixo_response
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains all the responses for the 360 feedback items.

FIELD.NAME: threesixo
FIELD.COMMENT: ID from feedback table.

FIELD.NAME: item
FIELD.COMMENT: ID from feedback_item table.

FIELD.NAME: fromuser
FIELD.COMMENT: Hashed user ID of the one giving feedback.

FIELD.NAME: touser
FIELD.COMMENT: Hashed user ID of the user that is being given feedback on.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: Value for the response given on the feedback item.
